tested non-stop toll collection etc.
vehicles will organize toll collection for cars.
Currently, entering the airport is still manual, the driver
has to park the car in front of the gate, pay the entrance fee,
take the card and pay cash at the exit, which can
easily lead to congestion, especially during the peak holiday season.
Vietnam Airports Corporation
has announced  Coordinate the installation of equipment to connect
automatic non-stop toll collection systems at
Noi Ba and Tan Nhat airports. Each
airport is expected to reserve two villages for
vehicles to use, etc. The two airports will
be tested for toll collection.  Do not stop
vehicles from February 6 to
March 7, the fee does not change. Specifically, vehicles
entering and exiting within 10 minutes each time are charged
10,000 VND for vehicles with less than nine seats 15,000 VND for vehicles with 10
to 30 seats 25,000 VND for vehicles with 30 seats or more
Vehicles entering the airport for more than 10 minutes will be charged
an additional car parking service fee.

Last night on the
Ho Chi Minh City Trung Luong Expressway, passing through
Tien Giang province, a collision occurred between a
tractor-trailer and a motorbike, resulting in the accident
killing the motorcyclist.
hospitalized for about 20 hours. Motorcycle V, a young man
over 20 years old, was driving traffic
on the Ho Chi Minh City expressway.
Trung Luong headed from Dong
Tam intersection to the expressway roundabout when the vehicle reached the
section.  At the intersection, the motorbike turned left and provincial road
878. Suddenly, a
tractor trailer moving in the same direction did not
handle it in time, so it crashed into the motorbike. The collision
caused the motorcyclist to fall onto the road and
was injured.  was taken to the hospital for emergency
treatment. Two vehicles were located, occupying most of
two lanes, making it
difficult for vehicles to travel through the area.
Traffic police of
Tien Giang province were present to regulate
traffic and handle the case.  The
accident happened around 12:00 noon. People heard a
loud noise when two cars
collided with each other on Trung
Luong My Thuan Expressway, passing through Chau Thanh district,
Tien Giang province. The collision caused one car to
lie next to each other.  The remaining vehicle turned back
in the opposite direction. Fortunately, the accident did
not cause any loss of life, but the
vehicle was damaged. Traffic congestion lasted for a long time
on the road. The
Trung Luong My Thuan Expressway management unit came to regulate.
traffic and handling the
accident after two days of investigation. Yesterday afternoon, Nghe
An province police arrested the suspect who

resides in Nghi Lien commune, Vinh city. The

monitored

At the police station, the
subjects confessed their crimes.
Hai Chau district police, Da
Nang city, said they had just caught two
subjects specializing in illegally buying and selling
drugs at nightclubs in Da Nang.  Da

gave it to Toan's neck with his arms
around the street.  Police

drugs and expanded the investigation the same

Long, 29, in possession of 15 ecstasy pills.
Drug pillow Long is a subject with a criminal

illegal drug trafficking. Currently,

China in the UK, many schools in the
metropolitan area around London are on the verge of
closing. If the
number of enrolled students continues to
decline, it is estimated that  It is estimated that schools in London
will see a decline of about 8,000
enrollments in the next 4 years,
mainly due to many families with young children leaving the
capital to settle elsewhere since the
covid-19 pandemic.  Due to the
rising cost of living and lack of affordable housing,
many families have left the capital. In
addition, the low birth rate is also a factor in the
decline in school enrollment rates. Specifically,
London's birth rate decreased by 17 PH during the period.  From
2021, fewer students enrolling has
created a significant strain on
school budgets for schools that receive
state financial support based on the number of
students enrolled.
must make
difficult decisions such as cutting teachers, narrowing
teaching programs or reducing the number of
extracurricular activities.

from this summer, Japanese local authorities
are expected to charge fees for
climbers of Mount Fuji. This measure is intended to
limit the overload of tourists and
help ensure their safety in this context.
There is growing concern about
overnight climbing. The
planned climbing fee is about 2,000 Yen,
equivalent to 230,000 VND. This fee is separate
from the about 1,000 Yen that
climbers are paying
voluntarily.  To protect the mountain, the
proceeds will be used to prevent
continuous climbing, build shelters in
case the volcano erupts, and
other measures. The government also limits the
number of climbers to 4,000 people.  One

Ladies and gentlemen, there are only 10 days left
until Valentine's Day, February 14, an
exhibition is taking place in Madrid,
Spain to  To welcome this day,
visitors can explore the
emotions of love through different periods.
Inspired by roses,
contemporary artist Noemi Eas created 25
works of art at the exhibition called
love.  me fast iglesias's creations
create connections with existing paintings
in the Tien Boren Museum Collection.
MissA noemi uses many different materials
such as glass bronze, but mostly
porcelain over the past decade.  She
searched for many ceramic and porcelain artists
in many countries to perfect their skills.
Visitors can explore the
forms of love through four
rooms, especially the last room talking about
love in ancient times.  During the development of
social networks, the female artist believes that
using dating applications makes people
lose their true feelings. She affirms that
love cannot be influenced by
algorithms. The exhibition will take place until
ends on the 28th of
